1.text: In that day you will say, “I will give thanks to you, Yahweh; for though you were angry with me, your anger has turned away and you comfort me.

2.text: Behold, God is my salvation. I will trust, and will not be afraid; for Yah, Yahweh, is my strength and song; and he has become my salvation.”

3.text: Therefore with joy you will draw water out of the wells of salvation.

4.text: In that day you will say, “Give thanks to Yahweh! Call on his name. Declare his doings among the peoples. Proclaim that his name is exalted!

5.text: Sing to Yahweh, for he has done excellent things! Let this be known in all the earth!

6.text: Cry aloud and shout, you inhabitant of Zion; for the Holy One of Israel is great in the midst of you!”
